thread.title: Child of the ’60s H.R. Pufnstuf visits ‘Mutt & Stuff’ to entertain 21st-century preschoolers
thread.title_full: Child of the ’60s H.R. Pufnstuf visits ‘Mutt & Stuff’ to entertain 21st-century preschoolers

author: News Staff
title: Child of the ’60s H.R. Pufnstuf visits ‘Mutt & Stuff’ to entertain 21st-century preschoolers
text:
by Lynn Elber, The Associated Press Posted Oct 13, 2015 7:01 am   13, 2015 at 7:40 am MDT 
LOS ANGELES, Calif. – H.R. Pufnstuf is coming back to television, and he’s bringing a few old pals along with him. 
The title character of the 1969-71 children’s series will appear on an episode of Nickelodeon’s new preschool series “Mutt & Stuff,” the cable channel said Tuesday. 
Pufnstuf will be joined by Freddy the Flute and Cling and Clang on a “Mutt & Stuff” episode taping next month. It’s scheduled to air in early 2016. 
“Mutt & Stuff” is produced by Sid and Marty Krofft, the same brothers who produced “H.R. Pufnstuf.” That show is still in reruns more than four decades after it debuted.
